!4 User permission tests
 * '''Case 1''': It should be possible to control '''creation''' of records using permission units
  * '''1a''': A user must not be able to '''create''' records with permission units not matching the user itself
  * '''1b''': A user must be able to '''create''' records with permission units matching the user itself
 * '''Case 2''': It should be possible to control '''updating''' of records using permission units
  * '''2a''': A user must only be able to '''update''' a record with a permission unit matching one of the user's permission units
  * '''2a''': A user must only be able to '''update''' records to ''move'' a permission unit to another one matching one of the user's permission units
  * '''2c''': A user must not be able to '''update''' records with permission units not matching the user itself
 * '''Case 3''': It should be possible to control '''deletion''' of records using permission units
  * '''3a''': It should not be possible to '''delete''' a record with a permission unit not matching the user itself
  * '''3b''': It should be possible to '''delete''' a record with a permission unit matching the user itself

!include -seamless .CoraTests.CallThroughJavaCode.BuiltInMetadata.BuiltInMetadataFunctionality.PermissionUnit.User.Actions.Create
!include -seamless .CoraTests.CallThroughJavaCode.BuiltInMetadata.BuiltInMetadataFunctionality.PermissionUnit.User.Actions.Update
